name: WKInterfaceTable
desc: An object that creates and manages the contents of a single-column table interface.

items.name: func setRowTypes([String])
items.desc: Creates the row controllers to use when populating the table with data.

items.name: func setNumberOfRows(Int, withRowType: String)
items.desc: Creates the specified number of row controllers (of the same type) to use in populating the table with data.

items.name: var numberOfRows: Int
items.desc: The number of row controllers available for you to retrieve.

items.name: func rowController(at: Int) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the row controller for the row at the specified index in the table.

items.name: func insertRows(at: IndexSet, withRowType: String)
items.desc: Inserts rows into the table at the specified indexes.

items.name: func removeRows(at: IndexSet)
items.desc: Removes the specified rows from the table.

items.name: func scrollToRow(at: Int)
items.desc: Scrolls the row at the specified index into view.

items.name: var curvesAtBottom: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the rows shrink to match the curved corners at the bottom of the screen.

items.name: var curvesAtTop: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the rows shrink to match the curved corners at the top of the screen.

items.name: func performSegue(forRow: Int)
items.desc: Performs the segue for the specified row.
